title: D-Day
creator_credit: Darryl Jordan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
brief_description: Darryl Jordan and his partner prepare their home for the encroaching bushfires. The wait for D-day is all-consuming for this family. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with Latrobe City and Arts Victoria.
creator_credit_for_label: Darryl Jordan, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
